title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4023.9 - Duties of placing judges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4023.9 - Duties of placing judges

State Regulations

The placing judge or judges must occupy the judge's box
at the time the horses pass the winning post, and their sole duty shall be to
place the horses. They must announce their decisions promptly, and such
decisions shall be final, unless objection to the winner or any placed horse is
made and sustained. Provided, that this section shall not prevent the placing
judges from correcting any mistake, such correction being subject to
confirmation by the stewards. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4023.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
